Android Facebook Application Development

Today Facebook is most powerful social networking website in the internet world with biggest social network among the millions users including like: students, professionals, businessmen and almost every age group masses. To increase the interaction plus more attractive, people uses to develop applications which are commonly known as Facebook applications. With help of these applications users can add more customized features to Facebook.
Benefits of Facebook application development:

> Branding
> Generates Prospective Clients
> Revenue
> Increase Web Traffic
> Communication
> Feedback

Android Application Development India (AADI) offering Android Social Networking Application Development with talent, expertise and latest technical acquaintance. With the modern view Social networking is stay connected with dear ones and doing various social activities provided by the social networking website such as Facebook, Twitter, Orkut and other popular sites.

Simple and Interesting Android Programming

Mobile applications are rated highly on the user experience that the app provides to its user. Android devices come in various shapes and sizes. The systematic addition of development activities to execute an idea into functional Android application is called android programming. The programming is gaining high popularity globally and millions of programmers utilize their skills online to accomplish easy implementation of the programs.

Those who are into Android programming have extensive and deep knowledge of Java because Android is based on Java platform. It is because of the rich platform that Android has to offer to the programmers, they are able to build and develop innovative applications accordingly.

Advantages of Android Application Development:
1) It allow fast information get-together
2) The enlargement tools are simple to utilize
3) Easy Access Outsourcing
4) Good Growth of Android-Based Devices

Due to high interest for Android applications, many companies have started the business of developing Android programming for applications. AADI provide quality Android app development services with the power of official Android SDK and the exposure of mobile application programmers that plays a significant role.

Android 4.1, Jelly Bean : Great New Features for Users and D

The latest version of Android, called Jelly Bean is the best version to date, and even users who own a Galaxy Note or a Droid RAZR MAXX with a skin on top will love the new features found in Android 4.1 . Google announced Jelly Bean in July, and it is available on the Nexus 7 and a handful of phones. It is the fastest and smoothest version of Android yet. Jelly Bean improves on the simplicity and beauty of Android 4.0, and introduces a new Google search experience on Android.

Features of Android Jelly Bean are :

>Offline voice typing
>Triple buffering
>NFC enabled
>Google Now
>Automatic widget resizing
>Advanced notification panel

Some other features like, predictive keywords in terms of advanced algorithm for predicting text has been introduced. Better search results with voice searching, increased frame rates, high synch between rendering and touch inputs are a few other add-ons provided in this new version.

Android application development India( AADI ) is leading android application development service provider company. We offers Android Apps development solutions supporting Android Jelly Bean features as per your business needs.

Android Twitter Apps – Social Media world in your pocket


Twitter has become one of the most pervasive social networking avenues today that apps for the Twitter service have been produced not just for desktops but also for Android smart phones and tablets. There are a lot of Twitter apps for every mobile platform, and the Android Market is full of them. Android Twitter app integration allows Twitter users with an Android phone the use of the QuickContact widget, which gives users a choice of ways to contact their followers.

Top 7 Android Twitter apps available are
· Plume - Plume is a beautiful, highly customizable Twitter client, which will change the way you feel about Twitter!
· TweetDeck - The app syncs with your TweetDeck account so you can easily manage your account right on your Android device.
· TweetCaster - The #1 Twitter app for Android with the most features of ANY Twitter app. And the only app with “Zip It”!
· Twitter - Real-time search reveals breaking news, while trending topics and maps show what’s happening now around the world.
· Twidroyd Pro - Twidroyd is the leading full-featured Twitter client for Android, with a customizable UberBar for easy navigation.
· Twicca - twicca is looking for supporters for the future development and maintenance.
· Seesmic - Seesmic is the best way to manage your social networks in one powerful and yet simple app.

Android Application Development India provides you unique and modified designs of twitter application development for Android. You can Hire Android app developer form any mobile application development firm and obtain Android Twitter applications with so many additional features. The apps are designed for easy access of all standard Twitter functions.

Android is one of the most useful device for developers to create powerful and innovative mobile applications remarkably easily and quickly. It is a mobile software platform as well as operating system designed on the Linux Kernel. Android application development market is booming and there is a great demand for developing custom applications for different purposes. Android being an open source provides a flexible platform to develop feature-rich apps.

1 An open source platform

It supports Java Language so that developers can build third party applications on Java, which can run on Android Platform.

Cake PHP the Need of The Hour

Written in the widely popular PHP, Cake PHP is an open source web application framework that is compatible with both versions – PHP4 and PHP5. Similar to the concepts of ROR (Ruby on Rails) framework and follows MVC coding pattern, it provides a wide array of components, templates and extensions that benefit in reducing both development cost as well as development time.With the help of the support from Cake PHP community all over the globe, there is the possibility of development of variety of apps – ranging from simple to complex, and for small, medium and large businesses and enterprises, Cake PHP is used in almost each and every industry like – retail, banking, finance, utilities, games, multimedia, entertainment and much more.Cake PHP development is the future of platforms on the web. It has certain features like access authorization list, data sanitation, simplified querying, website directory independent and in-built validation etc. that makes it popular in developing website based apps for years to come.All varieties of web applications can be explored and developed by using Cake PHP. Take a look at the given range of Cake PHP web development to know better:• Business Website Development• Entertainment websites• Social Networking Website Development• Portal Development• E-commerce Website Development• Real estate website development• CakePHP Ajax based Shopping Cart• Payment Gateway integration in websites• Entertainment Website DevelopmentFor your business to expand and attain maximum profits, you need to reach out to a maximum number of target audience and potential customers. Thus, it is much needed that you develop a dynamic website/web application that is well customised to accomodate your needs apart from being attractive and highly functional.Hire professional Cake PHP developer teams from a reputed offshore development center from India for getting optimum solutions at an unbelievable price. They not only provide you with the required solution, but also make sure that is is high in terms of quality, is robust, feature rich and scalable.You can avail the following services that are offered by many offshore IT development centers as their Cake PHP development expertise:• CakePHP web Development• CakePHP Customization• Cake PHP module development• CakePHP CMS• CakePHP Integration• CakePHP Extension Development• CakePHP Ajax based Shopping Cart• CakePHP Component development• Payment Gateway IntegrationSo, when you hire any company to suit your needs, check whether it consists of specialized team consisting of well trained and dedicated Cake PHP developer/programmers. They assure Cake PHP rapid development by utilizing their talent and the latest knowledge in the framework and PHP.Certified with ISO 9001:2008 company, Hidden Brains is a pioneer in various applications for the IT industry, particularly in mobile and web technologies. It has well trained and dedicated teams of CakePHP Developer to provide CakePHP Web Development to provide customized solutions to its global clientèle.

Hidden Brians Participation at Mobile World Congress 2012



Hidden Brains is today an IT Outsourcing global leader in Mobile and Web Application Development. The company’s management is happy to announce its scheduled tour of European countries during the third week of Feb 2012 with an aim to interact and communicate with our trusted clients. Its lead management team has scheduled an interactive visit to few of the European Countries like Poland, Austria, Sweden, Hungary, Switzerland, Czechoslovakia, Netherlands, Norway and others between 23rd Feb and 17th Mar 2012.

Management Team Members for Business Tour:
• Mr. Pramod Sinha - Director Business Development
• Mr. Atman Rathod - Business Development Manager
• Mr. Vivek Nair - Business Development Manager

The company representatives will meet clients and professionals belonging to various sectors and exchange main growth areas of mobile and web application development; moreover, have media interactions and typically exchange mobile expansion functionalities along with latest mobile apps delivered by the group. There would be exchange of web app as well as mobile app development success. We would like to welcome all our well wishers for any of their needs towards IT outsourcing and other related queries.

This visit will provide good opportunities to further discuss the effective implementation of various web and mobile technology advancements and to inspire an interest in quality mobile applications that we are developing. This trip of Europe will help us to better our associations with clients and drastically help to broaden our vision for future application development for web and mobile platforms.

Hidden Brians Participation at Mobile World Congress 2012
As part of our Europe tour, we will also represent ourselves at the Mobile World Congress 2012, to be held from 27th Feb to 1st Mar 2012 at Barcelona. We will prove and demonstrate our skillful innovations for various smart phones like iPhone, iPad, BlackBerry, Android, Symbian and in other Embedded Technologies etc., and will prove our expertise in Mobile app development field.

• Spain, Netherlands
• Germany
• Sweden
• Italy
• Norway
• Switzerland

Just catch us live at Booth No App.Planet-7G4 in Barcelona, Spain for any further interaction. For any query contact via contact@hiddenbrains.com.

Smart platform profile: Google Android



Google Android is an open-source platform for mobile phones and other devices from a mobile operator, handset manufacturer, and developer point of view. Google android is stylish, sleek and powerful handsets with various dynamic features that enable a person to stay connected with outside world, get thoroughly entertained and do any kind of work like that of PC at any point of time, even in the coursework of travelling with a single touch.
It is acknowledged to declare that Google Android will rule the world in the approaching years & Google Android development will reach higher heights. You need to hire professional Google android developers for a professional output as well as you get efficiency in the various work tasks. Google Android developer for Google Android apps development for your business, you would be capable to get exceptionally superior benefits.
You can hire professional and expert Google Android programmers for Android application development like communication, net applications, business applications, multimedia, travel applications, utility applications, fun, security applications, etc.

Three Great Google Android Apps
• Quickpedia - This is a free app that lets the user browse Wikipedia on the Google Android phone.
• Ringdroid - This was one of the first batches of apps to be released for the T-Mobile G1 phone. It lets users create ring tones from songs they already have on their phones.
• Fbook - This is the unofficial Facebook app for the Android phone. Just about everyone I know has a Facebook account.

Features of Google Android:
• Google Android will provide enhanced utilization of GPS services combined with Google maps. Very helpful in finding your way.
• The platform will be flexible to all mobile phones display layouts. Provided it has a color screen and GPRS enabled.
• Android will supports all common media formats
• It will support all the present cell phone network providers namely GSM/EDGE, CDMA, EV-DO, UMTS. It will also feature Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity.
• Messaging features - Supports text and picture SMS, MMS and the new XMPP
